Sentece: The decline in the concentration of plasma methyprylon was nonlinear between 66 and 30 micrograms/mL and linear at concentrations less than 30 micrograms/mL, with an apparent half-life of 4.4 h.
Title: Nonlinear elimination of methyprylon (noludar) in an overdosed patient: correlation of clinical effects with plasma concentration.
Name: Methyprylon

Sentece: The concentration of 5-methylpyrithyldione reached a maximum of 17 micrograms/mL approximately 13 h after admission and declined with a half-life of 8 h.
Title: Nonlinear elimination of methyprylon (noludar) in an overdosed patient: correlation of clinical effects with plasma concentration.
Name: Methyprylon

Sentece: The 4-h half-life of methyprylon, generally accepted for a therapeutic dose of 300 mg, is not appropriate in intoxicated patients and would greatly underestimate the time required to reach a safe therapeutic concentration of the drug.
Title: Nonlinear elimination of methyprylon (noludar) in an overdosed patient: correlation of clinical effects with plasma concentration.
Name: Methyprylon

Sentece: Mean (+/- SD) values for the half-life (9.2 +/- 2.2 h), apparent clearance, (11.91 +/- 4.42 mL/h/kg) and apparent steady-state volume of distribution, (0.97 +/- 0.33 L/kg) were found.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of methyprylon following a single oral dose.
Name: Methyprylon

Sentece: Mean (+/- SD) values for the half-life (9.2 +/- 2.2 h), apparent clearance, (11.91 +/- 4.42 mL/h/kg) and apparent steady-state volume of distribution, (0.97 +/- 0.33 L/kg) were found.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of methyprylon following a single oral dose.
Name: Methyprylon
